post:
<img src="https://myrskcloud.com/img/logocpcloud.png">

MyRSK webhosting solutions has entered the budget vps market since well over two years now (globally). However, we have been providing webhosting solutions since 2009 locally - in Dubai for young entrepreneurs and startup companies. We are currently holding strong with many, many happy clients :-)

We recently launched our MyRSKCloud product, and after great reviews we have decided that a EU location had to be introduced, and definitely not the Netherlands - a lot of providers there. Thus, Frankfurt was the new location that we decided on! Great quality, support, and an affordable price!

Our Promise: **5 Days Money Back Guarantee, no BS!**

<pre>
<b>Cloud Bundle - KVM</b>
2 Concurrent VM instances
1024MB Guaranteed RAM
50GB HDD RAID10
1000GB Bandwidth 1gigE Port
2 IPv4
1 Internal IP per VM
Deploy at your own will/pace in either **Phoenix, AZ (USA) or Frankfurt, DE (EU)**
FREE Shared hosting account (cPanel with 10GB HDD and 1TB BW, unlimited features)
$5.99/month only!
One price, many locations!
[[ORDER](https://myrsk.com/whmcs/cart.php?a=add&pid=138)]
</pre>

Some FAQ:

Q: Do you have windows available?
A: Currently no, after more testing is done, we will be offering windows templates.

Q: Can I request a windows ISO to be loaded? What about other ISOs?
A: You can not request a windows ISO to be loaded for the current time. Other ISOs will be loaded for you, just open a ticket :-)

Q: Can I order more resources?
A: You can open a ticket and request a larger quantity of Cloud Bundles. For example, you can combine 2 or more Cloud Bundles to make a larger Cloud Bundle.

Q: What about IPv6?
A: Native IPv6 is currently not available. It is easy to create your own tunnel on a KVM VPS, we can help!

Q: What are the available POPs (points of presence) currently?
A: Currently, you will be able to create a virtual machine at our Phoenix, US location and Frankfurt, DE. We hope to introduce new locations every 2-3 months.

Q: How do I get my free cPanel account?
A: There is a button/link in the Cloud Control Panel. Follow the instructions :-)
